p: During the fifth International Viral Hepatitis Elimination Meeting (IVHEM), 7â€“8 December 2018, Amsterdam, the Netherlands, an expert panel of clinicians, virologists and public health specialists discussed what progress is needed to achieve elimination, what major challenges are still to be faced and, in addition, the core indicators for monitoring progress. IVHEM brought together current or proposed HBV and HCV prevention and elimination programmes to share local experiences in planning and implementation of the key interventions recommended by WHO. Through information sharing, the goals of the meeting were to help programmes improve performance and guide development of new elimination programmes.
